| 17th April | 4:00 - 5:00 pm    | Social event    | Norris Louis room    |
|---------------------------|-------------------------------------|------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------|
| 24th April | 5:30 - 6:30 pm    | Check-in \& Registration    | Guild Lounge    |
| 24th April | 6:30 - 7:30 pm    | Keynote address     | Lutkin Hall    |
| 24th April | 7:30 - 8:30 pm    | Competition problem statement announcement    | Lutkin Hall    |
| 24th April | 8:30 - 9:30 pm    | Meet \& Greet    | Lutkin Hall    |
|---------------------------|-------------------------------------|------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------|
| 25th April | 10:30 - 11:00 am    | Check-in \& Breakfast    | Guild Lounge    |

| 25th April | 1:00 - 2:00 pm    | Lunch    | Guild Lounge    |
| 25th April | 2:00 - 6:00 pm    | Student teams working on their solution    | Guild Lounge    |
|---------------------------|-------------------------------------|------------------------------------------|------------------------------------|
| 26th April | 10:00 - 11:45 am    | Check-in & wrap-up presentations     | Louis Room    | |
| 26th April | 11:45 - 12:45 pm    | Stop work \& lunch    | Louis Room    |

| 26th April | 7:00 - 7:30 pm    | Extra time to accommodate any delay in schedule    | Louis Room    |
